description: This file defines a static class 'ReportsEndpoints' that sets up API endpoints for generating and downloading reports related to AI trends. It includes methods for mapping POST and GET requests under '/api/reports' in an ASP.NET Core minimal API setup.

classes.name: ReportsEndpoints
classes.description: Contains extension method to map report-related API endpoints under '/api/reports' for report generation and download.

methods.name: MapReportsEndpoints
methods.description: Extension method that defines API endpoints for creating a report and downloading it, including route configuration and response descriptions.
